name: Scanlon et al. v. Cauley, Appellant

parties: Scanlon et al. v. Cauley, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The order of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Adams.

casebody.head_matter:
Scanlon et al. v. Cauley, Appellant.

Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
